Onslaught enemies will now appear. Soul gain and Item Discovery increased.

Challenge modifiers will now be applied. Soul gain and Item Discovery increased.
Challenge modifiers will no longer be reduced.

Curses are modifiers that you may apply to yourself in exchange for a bonus.
Once enabled, a curse is applied after you rest at a bonfire, and will remain active until you disabled it at the Accursed Altar.
All curses have now been disabled.

Boosts soul absorption by 9%.

Enemies strike with unbridled wrath.
Enemies recover 100 stamina per second.
Boosts soul absorption by 10%.

You are blind to danger. Literally.
You are now shrouded by darkness.
Boosts soul absorption by 15%.

Your mind is fogged with confusion.
You no longer regenerate FP passively.
Boosts soul absorption by 10%.

Your gluttony has slowed your senses.
Doubles swing and evasive stamina consumption.
Boosts soul absorption by 10%.

Your strikes are pitiful and frail.
Enemies are virtually impossible to stagger.
Boosts soul absorption by 10%.

Your body is enfeebled by unholy magic.
Your max HP, FP and Stamina is reduced by 50%.
Boosts soul absorption by 15%.

Your weapons easily crumble.
The durability of your weapons will gradually degrade over time.
Boosts soul absorption by 10%.

The glorious kneel before no hollow.
Empowers bosses, increasing the following: - Damage by 50%. - HP by 30%. - Stamina by 30%. - Stamina recovery by 30. - Poise by 100. - Resistances by 50%.
Enables an additional chance for a Primordial Fragment.
Give the Blood of the Dark Soul

Lethal: reduces weapon stamina consumption by 15%. Magic: gains additional Bloodthirst charges on hit. Fire: increases max stamina by 20%. Lightning: increases Poise by 20%. Dark: absorb 15 HP on hit. Lucky: Increases Item Discovery by 25 and soul absorption by 10%. Enchanted: increases FP recovery by 13. Holy: restores an additional 3 HP per second. Sharp: consecutive attacks boost damage, up to 15%. Blunt: increases max equipment load by 10%.

Clarity: increases FP recovery by 13. Rejuvenation: grants an additional 15 stamina recovery. Restoration: restores an additional 3 HP per second. Respite: increases max equipment load by 10%. Lucidity: reduces FP consumption by 10%. Greed: increases soul absorption by 10%. Magic: increases Magic absorption by 5%. Fire: increases Fire absorption by 5%. Lightning: increases Lightning absorption by 5%. Dark: increases Dark absorption by 5%.

Pulsating: increases FP recovery by 13. Vibrating: restores an additional 5 HP per second. Throbbing: reduces FP cost of all spells by 10%. Quivering: boosts cast speed by 25. Laughing: converts the catalyst into Luck form: - Halves the INT and FTH required for spells. - Switches the catalyst scaling to LCK. Unstable: boosts spellbuff but: - Increases FP consumption of spells by 10% per cast. - Stacks, and each stack lasts 10 seconds.

You do not possess this accessory

Affixes are used to empower accessories, increasing the strength of their effects.
This process requires Primordial Fragments, with each level of affixing requiring more.
Basic: 2 Primordial Fragments Fine: 4 Primordial Fragments Superior: 6 Primordial Fragments Exquisite: 8 Primordial Fragments Legendary: 10 Primordial Fragments
Ring of the Sun's First Born
You do not possess this offering

Imbuement is used to empower companion accessories, increasing the strength of their effects.
This process requires Ritual Incense, with each level of imbuement requiring more.
Basic: 3 Ritual Incense Fine: 6 Ritual Incense Superior: 9 Ritual Incense Exquisite: 12 Ritual Incense Legendary: 15 Ritual Incense

Standard mode applies the following effects: Standard Reinforcement: - Weapons, shields and catalysts can be reinforced.

Wanderer mode applies the following effects: No Reinforcement: - Weapons, shields and catalysts cannot be reinforced.
Lessons of the Wanderer: - Every boss grants a permanent boost to baseline damage. - Every boss grants a permanent and unique boon.

Mythic mode applies the following effects: No Reinforcement: - Weapons, shields and catalysts cannot be reinforced.
Adventurer's Plight: - Player absorptions are reduced by 33%. - Player resistances are reduced by 33%. - World is populated by more enemies.

Gauntlet mode applies the following effects: Standard Reinforcement: - Weapons, shields and catalysts can be reinforced.
Gauntlet: - Face each boss in a gauntlet of your choosing.

Explorer mode applies the following effects: Standard Reinforcement: - Weapons, shields and catalysts can be reinforced.
Explorer's Crutch: - Increases absorptions by 33%. - Grants passive HP regeneration, restoring 1% every second. - Grants 30 stamina recovery. - Reduces soul absorption by 25%. - Blocks achievement rewards and affixing of accessories.

Onslaught mode applies the following effects: No Reinforcement: - Weapons, shields and catalysts cannot be reinforced.
Lessons of the Wanderer: - Every boss grants a permanent boost to baseline damage. - Every boss grants a permanent unique bonus.
Gauntlet: - Face each boss in a gauntlet of your choosing.
You will remain where you are.
You will start in Untended Graves once you begin your journey.
You will start in Archdragon Peak once you begin your journey.

Engage the boss or your progress will be reset.
DLC Bosses will now appear in the gauntlet.
DLC Bosses will now no longer appear in the gauntlet.

Gauntlet will now consist of bosses in a set order.
Defeat all bosses to complete the gauntlet.

Gauntlet will now consist of bosses in a random order.
Each time the boss will be randomised. Once defeated, a boss will no longer appear in the pool of available bosses.
Defeat all bosses at least once to complete the gauntlet.

Gauntlet will now consist of bosses in a set order without breaks between bosses.
Returning to Firelink Shrine will reset progress.
Defeat all bosses at least onceto complete the gauntlet.

Gauntlet will now consist of bosses in a reversed set order.
Defeat all bosses at least once to complete the gauntlet.

Gauntlet will now consist of bosses in a reversed set order without breaks between bosses.
Returning to Firelink Shrine will reset progress.
Defeat all bosses at least once to complete the gauntlet.

Gauntlet will now consist of boss selection, allowing you to select which boss to fight.
Once a boss is defeated, they will stop be selectable.
Defeat all bosses at least once to complete the gauntlet.
Bite Titanite Slab into 5 Titanite Chunks?
Bite Titanite Chunk into 5 Large Titanite Shards?
Bite Large Titanite Shard into 5 Titanite Shards?
Mastery of Attunement provides the following: - Increases passive FP restoration to 15 per second.
Mastery of Endurance provides the following: - Grants immunity to all non-lethal fall damage.
Mastery of Vitality provides the following: - Gain 100 attack deflection for 3 seconds every 9 seconds.
Mastery of Strength provides the following: - Boosts maximum equipment load by 25%.
Mastery of Dexterity provides the following: - Reduces weapon stamina consumption by 25%.
Mastery of Intelligence provides the following: - FP regeneration is no longer paused by any melee attack.
Mastery of Faith provides the following: - Doubles the effectiveness of HP restoration.
Mastery of Luck provides the following: - Gain a 5% chance to deal double damage with any weapon attack.

You have enabled the Mastery of Intelligence.
You have enabled the Mastery of Faith.
You have enabled the Mastery of Luck.

Hollowing has a marked effect on you, causing the following effects: - Reduces max HP by 5%. - Boosts Dark damage by 10%. - Boosts Dark absorption by 10%.
This effect can stack up to 10 times once at 99 Hollowing.

You harvest the remains of pilgrims, bolstering your own soul.

The memory will be weak and pitiful.
Soul absorption is reduced by 50%.
Completing the Memory will reward Titanite Shards.

The memory will require focus, but it easily won.
Soul absorption is not changed.
Completing the Memory will reward Large Titanite Shards.

The memory will challenge your skills.
Soul absorption is increased by 50%.
Completing the Memory will reward Titanite Chunks.

The memory will challenge your skills thoroughly and punish any mistakes.
Soul absorption is increased by 100%.
Completing the Memory will reward Titanite Slabs.

The memory will be near impossible for all but the toughest player.
Soul absorption is increased by 150%.
Completing the Memory will reward Primordial Fragments.

WARNING
You will need to complete this achievement, or enter a new journey to remove any acquired maluses.

Corruption enabled.
All bosses will now afflict you with Maluses upon their defeat.
Failed achievements are now possible again.
To complete Defying Death you need to: - Kill the Soul of Cinder. - Refrain from dying.
To complete Untouchable you need to: - Kill the Soul of Cinder. - Refrain from being hit.

To complete Flameless you need to: - Kill the Soul of Cinder. - Not light any unnecessary bonfires. You are allowed the following: - Firelink Shrine - Untended Graves - High Wall of Lothric - Foot of the High Wall - Pit of Hollows - Flameless Shrine - Chamber of the Princess
To complete Sword and Board you need to: - Kill the Soul of Cinder. - Never roll or backstep.
To complete Stormageddon you need to: - Kill the Nameless King with Restraint: Run enabled.
To complete Master of Corruption you need to: - Enable Corruption. - Defeat every boss whilst Corruption is enabled.
Completing Defying Death will reward you with: Relic of Eternity: reduces weapon stamina consumption massively
Completing Untouchable will reward you with: Relic of Swiftness: boosts movement speed massively
Completing Flameless will reward you with: Relic of Sanctification: boosts HP, FP and Max Stamina massively
Completing Sword and Board will reward you with: Relic of Protection: boosts all absorptions massively
Completing Stormageddon will reward you with: 1 Titanite Slab

Completing Master of Corruption will reward you with: Relic of Corruption: boosts all damage by 30%.
All Maluses will be cleansed.

You must have 99 Strength to coalesce.
You must have 99 Dexterity to coalesce.
You must have 99 Intelligence to coalesce.
You must have 99 Faith to coalesce.
You must have 99 Luck to coalesce.

Coalescence of Strength
Grants you a boon, boosting maximum equipment load by 30%.

Coalescence of Dexterity
Grants you a boon, boosting max Stamina by 30%.

Coalescence of Intelligence
Grants you a boon, boosting max FP by 30%.

Coalescence of Faith
Grants you a boon, boosting max HP by 30%.

Coalescence of Luck
Grants you a boon, boosting soul absorption by 30%.
